Articles.Content:
No, it looks nice and smooth.

TUBM Sleeps with their beard on top of the blankets. (If you don't have a beard, you just lost the game(If you don't know what the game is, now you'll hate me forever))

No Beard and when i sleep which is rare, I never pay any attention to blankets or beds I sleep where i fall... usually about 3 feet from the bed lol

TUBM has played Space Engineers.

I LOVE SPACE ENGINEERS!

TUBM is a trekkie AND a star wars fan

I only like Star Wars. Though I do like one quote from Star Trek, "KHHHHHHAAAN!" XD

TUBM is a skeptic.

Kinda.

TUBM thought KSP was not ready for 1.0

I was indifferent.

The user below me is made out of meat.

Mostly. May also contain: Bone, fat, hair and caffeine.

The user below me knows why the Russians use hot staging in their rockets.

To counter the siberian cold.

TUBM knows the siberian cold.

Nope, never been to russian.

The user below me knows spain's heat.

Not really, but I know Western Canada's heat (gives you sunburns on certain days).

The user below me has gone to an airshow.

No, they have a bad reputation over here in Germany.

The user below has flown in a helicopter.

No way, no how, never gonna happen, I am scared to death of open heights.

You totally think that's stupid, don't you...

False.

The user below me is hydrophobic.

As in, scare of water, or that weird thing where my body gets 1cm wide red dots all over whenever im in water? Im not scared, but the second...

TUBM is right now on Earth.

U hacked into my computer! (so, allergic then)

The user below me has shot with a gun.

Guns? Who needs guns when you got hussar sabres!

TUBM thinks guns sounds silly.

False.

The next poster has seen a rocket launch in person.

Edited August 12, 2015 by Smitty2558

No, but I hope to (and I am planning to visit Florida next spring, hopefully it will coincide with a launch from KSC).

The user below me has flown in a single engine plane.

Yes, but it was an RC plane.

TUBM has been fondled by the TSA.

False, I'm European and I've never flown to the US since I was a toddler.

TUBM knows/remembers what the link is between a crayon/pencil and a cassette tape.

But of course, I fixed many a cassette that way. Smooth writing implements don't work, though.

The user below me prefers crispy bacon to chewy bacon.

Im indifferent. To be honest, I think bacon is overrated.

The user below me sleeps in pyjamas.

Yes.

TUBM knows what kabanos is.

Not entirely sure, but in my country it's a type of sausage.

The user below me flew on a plane with 2 engines ;D

Yes, just this past March (B737-800).

The user below me has flown on a C-130 Hercules. (Spoiler: It's awesome, but loud.)
